sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable react/jsx-no-target-blank */ /* eslint-disable radix */ /* eslint-disable react/no-array-index-key */ import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { BrandContext } from "../BrandContext/BrandContext"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import clsx from "clsx"; import withStyles from "@material-ui/core/styles/withStyles"; import { Air, Clock, Close, Luggage } from "@cvccorp-components/icons"; import { Grid, Paper } from "@material-ui/core"; import moment from "moment"; import Typography from "../Typography"; import Box from "../Box"; import Button from "../Button"; import { styles } from "./styles"; const ModalDetailFlight = ({ classes, changeFlightOut, changeFlightBack, handleOpen, outwardFlight, backFlight }) => { // TODO rever implementação do contexto const ctx = useContext(BrandContext); const renderCardHeader = item => { function diffDateFormat(a, b) { const getHours = moment(a).diff(b, "hours"); const getMinutes = moment(a).diff(b, "minutes"); const formatMinutes = parseInt(getMinutes) % 60; return `${Math.abs(parseInt(getHours))}h${Math.abs(formatMinutes)}`; } return ( item && item.flights && !!item.flights.length && item.flights.map( (flight, index) => flight && ( <>
Voo {flight.flightNumber} - {item.issuerCiaName}
Classe {flight.cabin}
{moment(flight.departureDateTime).format("ddd[,] D [de] MMM [-] HH:mm")}
{flight.departureAirportDescription} ({flight.departureAirport})

{parseInt(flight.minutesDuration / 60)}h {flight.minutesDuration % 60}min de duração

{moment(flight.arrivalDateTime).format("ddd[,] D [de] MMM [-] HH:mm")}
{flight.arrivalAirportDescription} ({flight.arrivalAirport})

Espera de {diffDateFormat(flight.arrivalDateTime, item && item.flights && !!item.flights.length && !!item.flights[index + 1] && item.flights[index + 1].departureDateTime)} em{" "} {flight.arrivalAirport} para troca de avião
) ) ); }; const renderBaggageCard = item => { return ( item && item.flights && !!item.flights.length && item.flights[0] && item.flights[0].baggageInfo && (
Bolsa Pequena
1 item por adulto
Deve caber embaixo do assento
Peso não definido
0 ? clsx(classes.baggageCard, classes.active) : classes.baggageCard} > Bagagem de mão
{item.flights[0].baggageInfo.handBaggageQuantity} mala por adulto
Deve caber no bagageiro de cabine
Até {item.flights[0].baggageInfo.handBaggageWeight && item.flights[0].baggageInfo.handBaggageWeight} kg
0 ? clsx(classes.baggageCard, classes.active) : classes.baggageCard } > Bagagem despachada
{item.flights[0].baggageInfo.checkedBaggageQuantity} malas por adulto
Despachada no momento do check-in
Até {item.flights[0].baggageInfo.checkedBaggageWeight}kg
) ); }; return (
Detalhes do voo
<> {outwardFlight && outwardFlight.flights && !!outwardFlight.flights.length && outwardFlight.flights[0] && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo.checkedBaggageQuantity > 0 && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo.handBaggageQuantity > 0 && (
Bagagens Inclusas
Saiba mais
)} {outwardFlight && outwardFlight.flights && !!outwardFlight.flights.length && outwardFlight.flights[0] && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo.checkedBaggageQuantity === 0 && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo.handBaggageQuantity > 0 && (
Bagagem de mão inclusa
Saiba mais
)} {/* {outwardFlight && outwardFlight.flights && !!outwardFlight.flights.length && outwardFlight.flights[0] && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo .checkedBaggageQuantity && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo .checkedBaggageQuantity > 0 && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo .handBaggageQuantity === 0 && ( Bagagem de mão inclusa )} */} {outwardFlight && outwardFlight.flights && !!outwardFlight.flights.length && outwardFlight.flights[0] && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo.checkedBaggageQuantity && outwardFlight.flights[0].baggageInfo.checkedBaggageQuantity === 0 && outwardFlight.flights[0].handBaggageQuantity && outwardFlight.flights[0].handBaggageQuantity === 0 ? (

Sem Bagagem inclusas Saiba mais
) : null}
handleOpen()}> {outwardFlight && !!Object.keys(outwardFlight).length && (
Voo de Ida
{/*
{renderCardHeader(outwardFlight)}
)} {backFlight && !!Object.keys(backFlight).length && (
Voo de Volta
{/*
{renderCardHeader(backFlight)}
)} Entendendo suas bagagens inclusas Em todo voo você tem direito a levar uma pequena bolsa com seus pertences {renderBaggageCard(outwardFlight)} Para detalhes sobre dimensões permitidas, consultar sua companhia aérea. A {ctx.name} disponibiliza em cumprimento à Resolução ANAC 218 - que estabelece a tranparência e divulgação dos percentuais de atrasos e cancelamento de voos do transporte aéreo de passageiros no Brasil, o link com as estatísticas fornecidas pela Agência Nacional de Aviação Civil: anac.gov.br/atrasosecancelamentos .

Lembramos que a informação estará disponível mensalmente e refere-se sempre ao mês anterior.
); }; ModalDetailFlight.propTypes = { classes: PropTypes.object, onOpen: PropTypes.func, onClose: PropTypes.func, isOpen: PropTypes.bool, title: PropTypes.string, children: PropTypes.object }; export default withStyles(styles, { withTheme: true })(ModalDetailFlight);
